entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:30 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Fog dissipating this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light this afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
